definition: to go forward/to forge ahead/to advance/onward
front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound
Qianjin district of Kiamusze or Jiamusi city 佳木斯[Jia1 mu4 si1], Heilongjiang
see 勇往直前[yong3 wang3 zhi2 qian2]

sentences.english: Time is not on our side. We need to keep moving forward and we need to move fast.
sentences.chinese: 時不我待，我們必須不斷前進，行動迅速。

sentences.english: No retreat is allowed, only advance.
Sometimes riders urge their horses on with whips.
sentences.chinese: 騎馬的人有時用鞭子策馬前進。

sentences.english: Dashu knows to lower his head when he wants to get under his bed.
sentences.chinese: 大樹爬進小牀的時候會把頭低下，匍匐前進。

sentences.english: And then you go forward on that basis.
sentences.chinese: 承認了錯誤，才能繼續前進。

sentences.english: Only through creating & innovating, can one make progress continuously.
sentences.chinese: 只有開拓創新，才能不斷前進。

sentences.english: I'm a mini-snake, it snakes within world myself .
sentences.chinese: 我是一條小蛇，在自己的世界裏迂迴前進。

sentences.english: One stretch of the road was unlit, so we had to cycle in the dark.
sentences.chinese: 有段路沒有路燈，我們就只能摸黑前進。

sentences.english: The students must be in the classrooms by seven o'clock at the latest.
sentences.chinese: 學生最遲也要在七點鐘前進教室。

sentences.english: But I am confident that we are finally headed in the right direction.
sentences.chinese: 但我對於我們最終在正確的方向上前進充滿信心。

sentences.english: This is more like the Creeping Crud.
sentences.chinese: 這裏的要更象是”匍匐前進的骯髒東西“。

sentences.english: We were going at full throttle.
There three cars made a pari passu advance.
sentences.chinese: 這三輛小汽車以同樣的速度前進。

sentences.english: Continue pushing foward and success will eventually meet you.
sentences.chinese: 繼續前進，你最終會遇見成功。

sentences.english: Click the forward button, located by the start button.
sentences.chinese: 單擊位於開始按鈕旁邊的前進按鈕。

sentences.english: They haudio-videoe first wind up asen the quiet force of progress throughout our history.
sentences.chinese: 這些價值是確鑿的，是我們歷史上前進的安靜氣力。

definition: to step in/to stride forward/to forge ahead
to crane one's neck/to await eagerly/to lead/to show the way
practice/to put into practice/to live up to (a promise)/to carry out (a project)
to fight for/to strive for/to win over
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
